page.title: 03My Schoolday
page.content: When I get up in the morning I have a breakfast of cornflakes and tea, walk to school on my own arriving at about 8.30. I stand around chatting to my friends till 8.55 till the bell goes. On Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays we have a fifteen minute Assembly.In the morning we have Maths, English Workshop and Crosswords. This lasts until the 10.45 playtime which ends at 11 o'clock.We carry on with our work and have half an hour's reading until 12 o'clock. After dinner we might do Topic Work, Music, P.E., Swimming, or Art and Craft according to the day.Often we have a story read just before we go home at 3 p.m.Sometimes we have after- school clubs like Netball, Badminton, Football, Cycling or Swimming. Written by Vanessa Irvine(10).
